news_header: Gay imam's murder sparks fear and determination in LGBTQ+ community.
news_original_title: Even in his final seconds of life, first gay imam pushed boundaries
news_text: The execution-style killing of openly gay imam Muhsin Hendricks in South Africa has instilled fear in the LGBTQ+ community but also strengthened their resolve to combat marginalization in religious spaces. Hendricks was known for advocating inclusivity and performed interfaith marriages, challenging traditional norms. His death has prompted calls for justice and highlighted ongoing struggles for acceptance within faith communities.
